question: Which of following is hypertonic?
exp: ANSWER: (D) 3% normal saline. REF: Fluids & electrolytes by By Lippincott Williams & Wilkins page 264. Isotonic. Hypertonic. Hypotonic. Dextrose 5% in water5% dextrose in half normal saline0. 45% normal saline0. 9% normal saline (Na. Cl)5% dextrose in normal saline Ringer lactate. Dextrose 10% in water

question: Concentration of Na (m. Eq/I) in normal saline is?
exp: Ans. (d) 154. Ref: Essentials of General Surgery edited by Richard M. Belly Merril T. Dayton p-51 4thed
